COUNTRY
USA Canada

Four Brands. Countless Possibilities.
Combine products from our Leed's, Bullet, Trimark and JournalBooks brands to create one Perfectly PackagedTM gift.

Tradeshows + Events
Corporate Gifts
Employee Gifts

Personal Touch
Decorative packaging creates a more personal gift experience. Included with $9[G] fee.
Sturdy Lift-Top Box
Feels like you're opening a gift, not a bulk package.
Custom Branded Sticker
Make an impression the moment the gift arrives.
Decorative Packing Paper
Gives your gift a personal touch. Choose blue or gray.
Message Card
Choose from our templates, or provide artwork and we'll print it for you.
FYI
You can add third-party inserts, too! (Restrictions apply.)

How To Place Your Order
  1. Choose products for your custom Perfectly Packaged gift package.
  2. Download art templates to see size/space guidelines for your branded sticker and message card insert. See Distributor Resources below.
  3. Download and complete template for drop-shipment addresses. See Distributor Resources below.
  4. Submit your order at [email protected].
    • Note on PO(s) that order is Perfectly Packaged
    • Note color choice for decorative packing paper (blue or gray)
    • Include vector art and completed drop-ship templates with your PO(s)

For more tips and information, check out our Perfectly Packaged Ordering Guide.
